body:
## Expected Behavior

```
qlsh -u $CASSANDRA_USER -p $CASSANDRA_PASSWORD
Connected to temporal at 127.0.0.1:9042.
[cqlsh 5.0.1 | Cassandra 3.11.7 | CQL spec 3.4.4 | Native protocol v4]
Use HELP for help.
temporal-superuser@cqlsh> select * from system.peers;

 peer           | data_center | host_id                              | preferred_ip | rack    | release_version | rpc_address    | schema_version                       | tokens
----------------+-------------+--------------------------------------+--------------+---------+-----------------+----------------+--------------------------------------+--------------------------
 172.40.104.220 |         dc1 | b91372f3-4398-4771-915c-1491413c7f05 |         null | default |          3.11.7 | 172.40.104.220 | e84b6a60-24cf-30ca-9b58-452d92911703 |  {'-982307620647058983'}
   172.40.81.52 |         dc1 | ce15b693-de51-47c2-885c-e55fbe0436cb |         null | default |          3.11.7 |   172.40.81.52 | e84b6a60-24cf-30ca-9b58-452d92911703 | {'-7174789106171373222'}

(2 rows)
```

## Actual Behavior

```
echo $CASSANDRA_HOST:$CASSANDRA_PORT
127.0.0.1:9042

./temporal-cassandra-tool vh
2021/02/10 17:46:11 gocql: unable to dial control conn 127.0.0.1:9042: gocql: no response to connection startup within timeout
2021/02/10 17:46:11 unable to establish CQL session:gocql: unable to create session: control: unable to connect to initial hosts: gocql: no response to connection startup within timeout
```

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

```
git clone git@github.com:temporalio/temporal.git temporal-git
cd temporal-git/
make install

export CASSANDRA_HOST=127.0.0.1
export CASSANDRA_PORT=9042
export CASSANDRA_USER=myuser
export CASSANDRA_PASSWORD=mypass

./temporal-cassandra-tool vh
```

## Specifications

  - Version: `temporal-cassandra-tool version 0.0.1`
  - Platform: macOS 11.2
